name: Project VGTBL
description:
(DEMO/Unfinished) THE DARKEST OF TIMES CALLS FOR THE MIGHTIEST OF WARRIORS

Join your fighter on an epic quest of glory, vengeance, and bloodshed. Build your Hero and learn the ways of the world as you traverse treacherous unknown lands. Glory to the fight and may the fire test your might, only the strongest survive in a world of CHAOS.

This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam of January 2023 using the Godot 4.0 beta engine.

Currently the gameplay is limited to assembling your rooty friend and moving them around a bit to see how it looks in action. Guts and glory functionality coming at a later date lol. 

CREDITS

Art: @Wruyn
SFX: Zapsplat Chiptone
Everything else: @thedonotknow
